name: MicroProfile LRA 2.0-RC1
body:
[Javadocs](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-lra-2.0-RC1/apidocs) | [Spec PDF](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-lra-2.0-RC1/microprofile-lra-spec-2.0-RC1.pdf) | [Spec html](https://download.eclipse.org/microprofile/microprofile-lra-2.0-RC1/microprofile-lra-spec-2.0-RC1.html)
This is the 2.0-RC1 release. Maven coordinates:

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.eclipse.microprofile.lra</groupId>
      <artifactId>microprofile-lra-api</artifactId>
      <version>2.0-RC1</version>
    </dependency>

## Changes in 2.0-RC1

This is the first release candidate of the 2.0 release. The full list of changes from 1.0 can be found at https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-lra/compare/1.0...2.0-RC1.

- https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-lra/issues/347 - Use of enum LRAStatus as entity parameter
- https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-lra/issues/352 - A few mistakes in the spec
- https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-lra/issues/351 - Jakarta EE 9.1 Alignment

name: MicroProfile LRA 1.0
body:

This is the 1.0 release. Maven coordinates:

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.eclipse.microprofile.lra</groupId>
      <artifactId>microprofile-lra-api</artifactId>
      <version>1.0</version>
    </dependency>

This is the first final release of the MicroProfile LRA specification.

name: MicroProfile LRA 1.0-M1
body:

This is the 1.0-M1 release. Maven coordinates:

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.eclipse.microprofile.health</groupId>
      <artifactId>microprofile-health-api</artifactId>
      <version>1.0-M1</version>
    </dependency>

## Changes in 1.0-M2

This is the first milestone release of the MicroProfile LRA specification that is released after the initial 1.0-RC1 because additional development was required. The full list of changes can be found at https://github.com/eclipse/microprofile-lra/compare/1.0-RC1...1.0-M1.
